revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC86 |revision=U (1.40) |asin=B0752FD3XJ |newegg=N82E16833320339 |price=200 |series=AC2900 |est_release_date=08/22/2017 |fcc_date=04/20/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117B |manuf_rev=AC44-ASU |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACHN00 |ic_id=3568A-RTAC86U |pcb_id= |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=1.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4906;BCM4906KFEBG, TK1620, P55W-01 N2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107:P |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen 1), USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, DFS (master), AiMesh, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_2G$,,,^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:D7:F6 |oui_eth=88:D7:F6 }}
:• '''2167''' Mbps max PHY rate for the 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''750''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2900 Dual-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Gaming-Networking/RT-AC86U/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|region=us|model=RT-AC86U}} "RT-AC86U REV 1.40" and "1650" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3365350 board]. :Web GUI: http://router.asus.com According to the ''[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3365365 Model Names Confirmation Letter]'' at the FCC: {{Quote|text=Model No: *[[ASUS RT-AC86U]] (RT-AC86A/RT-AC86P/RT-AC86R/RT-AC86X) *'''[[ASUS RT-AC68U Extreme]]''', [[ASUS RT-AC2900]] (ASUS AC2900) :are identical in electrical, mechanical and physical design The difference between these models is only for marketing purpose}} {{see also|ASUS RT-AC88U|ASUS RT-AC68U|Arcadyan}} ''XX in the default SSID refers to the last two digits of 2.4GHz :MAC address found on the label on the back of the router'' A Class II Permissive Change Letter submitted to the FCC 11/14/2017 :indicates two major changes to the product: *1. Add WLAN 5G band 2 and band 3 functions (DFS) *2. Add Mesh function. ([https://www.asus.com/aimesh/ AiMesh]) {{WiFiCert|WFA71061|05/24/2017}} ===Overview=== *Ultra-fast 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi router boosts speeds up to 2167 Mbps for :low-latency online gaming, smooth ''4K UHD'' video playback and fast file-sharing *4x4 antenna design with ''AiRadar'' universal beamforming for unrivaled Wi-Fi range *''ASUS Router App'' lets control network anywhere, without needing to boot up a PC. *Exclusive built-in game accelerator from ''WTFast'' lets you enjoy smooth gameplay :in supported multi-player online games *''AiProtection'' with ''Trend Micro'' for triple-strength network security, plus robust :''Parental Controls'' and privacy protection *Revolutionary ''MU-MIMO'' technology can connect multiple MU-MIMO-compatible :clients at each device’s maximum speed simultaneously *With built-in ''USB 3.1 Gen 1'' and USB 2.0 ports, you can connect USB-enabled :devices, such as external storage drives, printers, or a ''3G/4G dongle'' to your :ASUS router and share them conveniently with other users via Wi-Fi :And with ''USB 3.1 Gen 1'', you can enjoy up to 10x faster data transfer speeds ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33158-asus-rt-ac86u-dual-band-ac2900-wireless-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-asus-rt-ac86u-ac2900-wireless-router ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[http://greentechreviews.ru/2017/10/27/obzor-marshrutizatora-asus-rt-ac86u/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''GreenTechReviews'''] (RU) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/rt-ac86u/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac86u-hit-the-fcc.38770/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin) *[http://vip.asus.com/forum/topic.aspx?board_id=11&model=RT-AC86U&SLanguage=en-us ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''ASUS VIP''' official forums] *[https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/forum-replies.cfm?t=2660120 ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''Whirlpool''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1780-asus-rt-ac86u-wireless-ac2900-dual-band-gigabit-router/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) *[https://www.asus.com/tw/forum/list?aid=74446 ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''Asus''' forums] (TW) *[http://www.asussmart.com/smart/557.html ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''AsusSmart'''] (CN) ===Spec. aggregators=== *[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=1770 On '''Whirlpool'''] ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info |
export RT-AC86U := $(HND-94908_BASE)
export RT-AC86U += BUILD_NAME="RT-AC86U" NVSIZE="128" DHDAP=y DPSTA=n 
  LACP=n WTFAST=y REPEATER=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=n IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y 
  ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y 
  MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y 
  USB="USB" APP="installed" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y SHP=n BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y 
  TUNEK="n" DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y 
  LED_BTN=y BCMSMP=y XHCI=y DUALWAN=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y OPENVPN=y 
  TIMEMACHINE=y MDNS=y VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y BWDPI=y 
  DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y LINUX_MTD="64" DEBUGFS=y TEMPROOTFS=y SSH=y EMAIL=y 
  SYSSTATE=y ROG=y STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y JFFS2USERICON=y 
  REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y WLCLMLOAD=n BCM_MUMIMO=y 
  LAN50=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y TFAT=y NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" 
  NEWSSID_REV2=y LAN4WAN_LED=y NEW_APP_ARM=y NETOOL=y TRACEROUTE=y

export AC2900 := $(HND-94908_BASE)
export AC2900 += BUILD_NAME="AC2900" NVSIZE="128" DHDAP=y DPSTA=n LACP=n 
  WTFAST=n IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y ARM=y AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y 
  EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y NO_FTP=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=n PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=n 
  PRINTER=n WEBDAV=n USB="USB" APP="none" PROXYSTA=n DNSMQ=n SHP=n BCMWL6=y 
  BCMWL6A=y TUNEK="n" DISK_MONITOR=y BTN_WIFITOG=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y 
  LED_BTN=y BCMSMP=y XHCI=y DUALWAN=n USER_LOW_RSSI=y OPENVPN=n TIMEMACHINE=n 
  MDNS=n VPNC=n BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y BWDPI=n DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y 
  TEMPROOTFS=y SSH=y EMAIL=y SYSSTATE=y ROG=n STAINFO=y CLOUDCHECK=n NETOOL=y
  NATNL_AICLOUD=n JFFS2USERICON=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y MULTICASTIPTV=n QUAGGA=n 
  WLCLMLOAD=n BCM_MUMIMO=n LAN50=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y CFEZ=y TFAT=y 
  NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" NEWSSID_REV2=y LAN4WAN_LED=y NEW_APP_ARM=y 
  TRACEROUTE=y NONASUS=y NO_DAAPD=y SMARTSYNCBASE=n LINUX_MTD="64"
}} ===See also=== [[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AC2900]] - ''AC2900 Dual-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router'' ==Images== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/285-asus-rt-ac86u/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U photo gallery'' on '''OpenITforum'''] __NOTOC__
